troubleshooting.title: Embedded videos or widgets do not load

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: Embedded videos or widgets do not load when embedded in the document by using the oxy_browser form control.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: This occurs when the website where the videos or widgets are loaded from is not set as trusted. Loading untrusted widgets on the web page of can create security risks, so it is disabled by default.

steps-informal.p: You can configure the website URL from which the videos are loaded as a trusted code location in the Administration Page. For example, you can use https://youtube.com/.
